articles.description: Both have been high-quality teams in limited-overs cricket in recent years, but have few title wins to show for it - and that, by popular opinion, is an issue

articles.title: Danushka Gunathilaka: Cricketer choked and raped woman, police allege - BBC
articles.description: Danushka Gunathilaka was in Australia for the T20 World Cup when he was arrested on four counts of rape.
articles.content:
A Sri Lankan cricketer accused of raping a woman while in Australia for the T20 World Cup choked her so forcefully she was left "fearing for her life", court documents allege.
